item.title: WaNN generic
item.description: [[Terms/WaNN|WaNN]] conspect. NN at a particular scale Trainable and non-trainable variables Particular [[Terms/NN/Loss function|loss function]] Learns and improves its abilities. NN is developing models Learning of Distributions, Bayesian Learning [[Terms/NN/Environment|Environment]] Model of Self - [[Terms/Consciousness|Consciousness]] Action of Self on [[Terms/NN/Environment|Environment]] Planning (Possible words) Counterfactuals NN goes through [[Terms/Phase transition|phase transition]] Specialized [[Terms/Connectome|connectome]] appears from fully connected network Trainable variables are separated into temporal classes.
